title: Handle Scroll Stop
description: In this lab, we will explore how to handle scroll stop events using JavaScript. We'll learn how to detect when a user has stopped scrolling and execute a callback function accordingly. This skill is useful for creating more efficient and optimized web applications that only run code when necessary.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
